trans-unit.source: Represents the Subject element specified in [Saml2Core, 2.4.1].
trans-unit.target: 代表 [Saml2Core 2.4.1] 中指定的主旨項目。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject.NameId%2A> property is `null` and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject.SubjectConfirmations%2A> collection is empty, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> will be thrown during serialization.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject.NameId%2A>屬性是`null`和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject.SubjectConfirmations%2A>集合是空的<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>序列化時將會擲回。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject.SubjectConfirmations%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject.NameId%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the element that this class represents, see the SAML V2.0 Core specification.
trans-unit.target: 如需此類別代表之項目的詳細資訊，請參閱 SAML V2.0 核心規格。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2NameIdentifier"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject"></xref>類別具有指定<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2NameIdentifier"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject.NameId%2A> property is set to the value specified by the `nameId` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject.NameId%2A>屬性設定為所指定的值`nameId`參數。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject.NameId%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2NameIdentifier"></xref> that represents the name identifier.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SubjectConfirmation"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject"></xref>類別具有指定<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SubjectConfirmation"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject.SubjectConfirmations%2A> collection is initialized with the value specified by the `subjectConfirmation` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject.SubjectConfirmations%2A>集合會使用所指定的值初始化`subjectConfirmation`參數。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject.SubjectConfirmations%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the identifier for the subject.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定主體的識別項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains information that allows the subject to be confirmed.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合，其中包含可確認主體資訊。

trans-unit.source: If more than one subject confirmation is provied, then satisfying any one of them is sufficient to confirm the subject for the purpose of applying the assertion.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定多個主體確認，然後滿足其中任何一個已足夠確認以套用該判斷提示的主體。
